[blast]
executable     = psiblast
dbformatexe    = makeblastdb
path           = /usr/local/ncbi/blast/bin/

[dssp]
executable     = dsspcmbi
path           = /soft/bio/structure/dssp

[cd-hit]
executable     = cd-hit
path           = /soft/bio/sequence/cd-hit

[hmmer]
executable     = hmmsearch
dbformatexe    = hmmpress
path           = /soft/bio/sequence/hmmer-3.0/bin/
